text:
Short of Thanos himself snapping away half the TV industry, you’ll never have time to catch up on every scripted show out there. And now that the broadcast network shows have said goodbye for the season, what better time to stock up on some overlooked favorites airing new episodes?

We’re keeping this list strictly to shows that have confirmed episodes ahead of them (sorry, Timeless), but ScreenCrush editor E. Oliver Whitney and writer Kevin Fitzpatrick have otherwise assembled 17 TV shows across network, cable and streaming that are worthy of your attention, if not outright adoration. From Killing Eve to Krypton, here’s everything you didn’t know you’d been missing:

Which of your favorites did we miss?
title: 17 TV Shows You Need to Start Watching
